passenger.title: Waiting list
passenger.waitingList.helper:
This waiting list is only visible to administrators.
It allows to see who has activated an alarm with its desired location and its desired proximity radius.

When a passenger leaves a trip, they are automatically placed on the waiting list.
When an administrator places a passenger on a trip, the passenger is informed by email that he has been added to a trip and must contact the driver to establish a connection.
